column1: Little Goat Diner////was so greasy she ate only half and did not take it home. Too overdone with butter and
column2: it was burnt. My son ordered the meat concoction that had a goat burger
column4: roast beef topped with a toasted roll and a fried onion ring. Totally too much
column5: if you are into meat gluttony! BTW
column6: the meat in the Reuben is not corned beef! It's roast beef and definitely would Not order. What is a Reuben w/o corned beef?
